meanings.sent1: The multiheaded monster was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The multiheaded hydra guarded the entrance to the cave.
meanings.sent3: The multiheaded statue in the park always made children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The multiheaded problem seemed impossible to solve.
meanings.sent5: The multiheaded dragon breathed fire from each of its heads.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving multiple heads.
meanings.sent1: The multiheaded robot could perform many tasks at once.
meanings.sent2: The multiheaded organization had various departments working together.
meanings.sent3: The multiheaded flower arrangement was a unique centerpiece.
meanings.sent4: The multiheaded project required coordination among different teams.
meanings.sent5: The multiheaded team brainstormed ideas for the upcoming event.
